install.name: mr.mcs Remove Unsuitable Content plugin
install.author: Markus Schmucker
install.description: Strips content which is either suitable only for mobile phones or content that is not suitable from the generated content, based on css classes.

param.name: stripcssclass
param.label: CSS class for mobile unsuitable content
param.description: The CSS class for content to be removed for mobile devices

param.name: onlyformobile
param.label: CSS class for mobile only content
param.description: The CSS class for content to be removed for non-mobile devices
